pr_slice: PR-2: Frontend UI with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and API integration

verification_items.description: Given calculator loads, When page renders, Then display shows 0 AND all operation buttons visible
Given display shows 0, When user clicks digit 5, Then display shows 5
Given display shows 5, When user clicks +, Then first operand stored AND display cleared for second operand
Given operands entered, When user clicks =, Then API called AND result displayed
Given result displayed, When user clicks C, Then display resets to 0
Given result 10, When user clicks M+, Then API /memory/add called AND memory indicator shows
Given memory has value, When user clicks MR, Then API /memory called AND memory value displayed
Given memory has value, When user clicks MC, Then API /memory DELETE called AND indicator hidden
Given any state, When user clicks M-, Then current display value subtracted from memory via API
Given second operand is 0, When user clicks / then =, Then display shows Cannot divide by zero
Given backend unavailable, When calculation attempted, Then display shows Connection error AND buttons remain functional
Given API returns error, When response received, Then error message displayed AND display not cleared
Given result is very large number, When displayed, Then use scientific notation if exceeds display width
Given user clicks = without operator, When pressed, Then current number remains displayed (no API call)
Given user enters multiple decimals, When second . clicked, Then second decimal ignored
Given button clicked, When interaction occurs, Then visual feedback within 50ms

verification_method.manual_steps: Click buttons, verify immediate visual response

verification_items.description: Given calculation submitted, When API responds, Then result displayed within 200ms total

verification_method.manual_steps: Time calculation from click to result display
